tagline: jQuery date choice control with dropdown list
name: jSelectDate
body:
jSelectDate is a simple drop-down list date select of jQuery plugin . It is different from previous choice of the date of control, it is embodied in the way the drop-down list, this may facilitate a better user experience. ### Example ![](http://www.cnblogs.com/images/cnblogs_com/huacn/calendar_3.PNG) ```html jQuery.jSelectDate example
